lupe fiasco: from city to city i really did it for yall from the itty bitty small to the really really tall where they paw and they living in a shelter begging with their kids theyre too helpless to help her if you walk in trailer park today or a park where the ground is too harsh to lay or the projects where theres no park to play and its too dark to read and youre too marked to leave where wick only buys juicy juice and kicks its a trip because the youth is usually used to this and thats strength and you gotta be strong when the dramas on your back and your clothes dont match and your father is gone and on top of all that the water isnt on and your dishes dont match the teachers say they only come to school to flunk but theres some that only go to school for lunch and thats life
